snippet: A journalist based in western Belarus has been indicted on libel charges after alleging that President Aleksandr G. Lukashenko influenced a court decision to execute two men.
abstract: Andrzej Poczobut, a Polish journalist based in western Belarus, is indicted on libel charges after alleging that Pres Aleksandr G Lukashenko influenced a court decision to execute two men convicted of an April 2011 bombing of a Minsk subway station.
lead_paragraph: A journalist based in western Belarus has been indicted on libel charges after alleging that President Aleksandr G. Lukashenko influenced a court decision to execute two men.

headline.main: Belarus: Journalist Indicted on Libel Charges
headline.print_headline: Belarus: Journalist Indicted on Libel Charges
